name: Banana Strike
description:
So... What is this game? Have you ever player Counter-Strike? Ok, this is not like it, but its name is Banana Strike. It's a top down shooter multiplayer where you are a banana with a gun and your objetive is to destroy the bananas of the enemy team.

This is a 100% multiplayer game, there is no way to play it single-player. In order to play it you need to have Steam running, otherwise you will not be able to host/join a server.

This game was made in 24 hours, here is a video where I show you how I made it (spanish with english subs)

Controls: 

  • WASD -> Movement
  • Left click -> Shoot
  • Right click -> Shield
